I'm a problem-solver who leads a Sales Consulting team at a large software company. My work focuses on the High Tech industry, where I help my team design solutions that address our customers' unique business challenges and pain points.

Throughout my career, I've designed efficient staffing models, created business intelligence dashboards for leadership, and contributed technical solutions using our platform toolset. My greatest achievement has been building strong, creative teams who consistently deliver exceptional results for our customers.

Outside the office, you'll find me bird watching, spending time with my kids, or seeking out solace in the great outdoors.
